kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Personally, I'm really looking forward to updating the Community Portal to use taxonomies.
We have content item relationships for Blog posts that are a stand-in for taxonomy, but Q&A doesn't use any taxonomies at the moment. That's why we see "Answer Question" and "Submit your answer" buttons when engaging in comments for a blog post here.
There's [a little bit of string comparison on Q&A question titles](https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal/blob/v28.2.1.9/src/Kentico.Community.Portal.Web/Features/QAndA/Components/Search/QAndASearch.cshtml#L81) to improve the UX, but obviously not enough.
Taxonomies will make these UX improvements easy and scalable.
They will also simplify the [BlogPostList](https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal/blob/v28.2.1.9/src/Kentico.Community.Portal.Web/Components/Widgets/BlogPostList/BlogPostListWidget.cs) widget used on the home page.
